doc.title: Consequences of the Moment
doc.plot: One bad consequence leads to another when a young prostitute finds herself staring into the mirror of her own reflection. After bashing her john's head repeatedly with a statue while he was sleeping, she finds herself standing naked and alone in a motel bathroom. Like a frozen mannequin, Amelia is triggered in recalling her earliest nightmare. Journeying back in time she walks the familiar hallway of her childhood home only to relive the haunting sounds and gory memories.
